vocabulary.definition: hard structures in the mouth used for biting and chewing (dientes)
the color of snow or milk (blanco)
items worn to cover the body (ropa)
a garment for the upper body (camisa)
the color of a lemon or the sun (amarillo)
a garment for the lower body (pantalones)
the color of chocolate or wood (marrón)
a breakfast food made from grain (cereal)
